//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.4.mo: You won this mansion in a contest you didn't even enter? Sounds pretty fishy to me...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.5: So, you believe the mansion actually exists, then... strange.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.5.mo: So, you believe the mansion actually exists, then... strange.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.6: I've been living here since I was a lad of twenty or so, and I'll tell you: that mansion appeared just a few days ago! The spirits have fooled you!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.6.mo: I've been living here since I was a lad of twenty or so, and I'll tell you: that mansion appeared just a few days ago! The spirits have fooled you!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.7: I don't know if it's a dream, an illusion, or what all, but I surely wouldn't be too happy winning a haunted house.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.the_mansion.8: Now that I get a look at you, I just recalled... A guy with a red hat kind of like yours, went up to the mansion without even stopping to chat... and he never returned. Was he a dream, too?

//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.1: Boo hoo hoo! Where did you go, Mario? Waaaaaah! Wah!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.3: Waa... Wow! It's %1$s! You finally made it! Oh, joy! Thank goodness!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.3.more: Waa... Wow! You finally made it! Oh, joy! Thank goodness!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.4: Me? Well, Princess Peach asked me to come here to look for Mario. He left when he heard that you'd won a mansion, and he never returned!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.4.more: Me? Well, Princess Peach asked me to come here to look for Mario. He left when he heard that you'd won a mansion, and he never returned!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.5: Th... then when I arrived here, the mansion was full of ghosts, and I didn't see Mario anywhere, and I kind of freaked out a little, and I didn't know what to do!! It's been awful!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.6: Please, please, please, you HAVE to help me find Mario! If he doesn't get back, you have no idea how upset the princess will be! She'll flip!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.6.more: Please, please, please, you HAVE to help me find Mario! If he doesn't get back, you have no idea how upset the princess will be! She'll flip!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat: Well, this is about all I can do for you, but...

//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat.bo: %1$s! A Boo! There was this big Boo flying around here! Be extra careful!
Everybody! A Boo! There was this big Boo flying around here! Be extra careful!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.repeat.mo: Well, this is about all I can do for you, but...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.1: Yay! Thanks, %1$s! You made my dark and stormy night!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.1.mor: Yay! Thanks, everybody! You made my dark and stormy night!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.2: I wish I could do something to help you.. Wait! I've got it! At least let me do this...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.2.mor: I wish I could do something to help you.. Wait! I've got it! At least let me do this...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_1.yes.3: Talk to me for help anytime!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.1: Waaaah! Waaaah! Mario, where are you? WAAAAH!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_2.3: Yes! %1$s! How lucky that you found me! I feel so much better now!

//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.1.mor: Heyy... You're right! No point crying over spilt milk!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_3.yes.2: I suppose I'll just flush that old worry away. Yup, I'll just let it swirl on down to the depths and let happiness refill me life!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.1: You saw him, didn't you? How could they DO that to Mario?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.1.more: You saw him, didn't you? How could they DO that to Mario?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.2: When I saw him like that, I completely lost it and ran through the mansion looking for a hiding place.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.3: While I was running, though, I did happen to notice that Mario left some of his things laying around the place.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.4: A hat, a glove, a shoe, a letter, and a star. I saw five items altogether.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.5: I'd go collect them for you if I could remember where they were. Yeah... I probably should've picked some up...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.5.more: I'd go collect them for you if I could remember where they were. Yeah... I probably should've picked some up...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.look.1: Sniff... sob... Suh-something TERRIBLE is in that well...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.1: By the way, I have a good idea about what to do with Mario's things!
I'll stay here, if that's OK...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.no: Mario dropped five items: a hat, a glove, a shoe, a letter, and a star. Thanks for looking for them!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.repeat.ye: There's a ghost around here somewhere who can see the future by touching a person's personal effects! Her name is Madame Clairvoya.
I'm sure Madame Clairvoya would be able to tell you how Mario got turned into a painting if she had those items.
I'm sure Madame Clairvoya would be able to tell you how Mario got turned into a painting if she had those items.

Why don't you try showing those items to her?

//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_4.yes.1.mor: Whaa-huh? Really?! You'll find all Mario's items for me?!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.1: ...He-Hello? ...May I ask who is speaking... please?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.2: Whew! It's me, Toad! I don't know what I would have done if a ghost had answered!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.3: Anyway, we have a terrible problem! The lightning caused a blackout all over the house! What should we do?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.4: We're really, REALLY afraid of the dark! Isn't there a way you can turn the lights back on?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.toad_5.yes.4.mor: We're really, REALLY afraid of the dark! Isn't there a way you can turn the lights back on?

//luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.0: %1$s, that was a sorry effort! Why I bet your brother would be laughing fit to split if he saw you. Try again from the beginning, OK?
Kiddos, that was a sorry effort! Why I bet your brother would be laughing fit to split if he saw you. Try again from the beginning, OK?
//luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.1: That's the vacuum cleaner I engineered to catch ghosts, I call it... this is genius... the Poltergust 3000! It can suck up all kinds of things. Let 'er rip!
Those're the vacuum cleaners I engineered to catch ghosts, I call them... this is genius... the Poltergust 3000s! They can suck up all kinds of things. Let 'em rip!

Just give it a try. You'll learn more that way than just listen to me yap about it.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.11: Remember, as soon as you see a ghost's heart, that's your chance to vacuum 'em up!
Remember, as soon as you see a ghost's heart, that's your chance to vacuum 'em up!
//luigis_mansion:dialog.training_room.12: While vacuuming, move in the opposite direction to bring 'em in!

I'd say you're ready to look for your brother now.

Fine, fine. Looks like you worked up quite a sweat there.

//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.2: Oh, sorry to surprise you, boy! It's me, Professor E. Gadd... Sorry for disturbing you.
Oh, sorry to surprise you, kiddos! It's me, Professor E. Gadd... Sorry for disturbing you.
//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.3: I know I usually contact you by Gameboy Horror, but I thought I'd use this phone since you were in the room...
I know I usually contact you by Gameboy Horror, but I thought I'd use this phone since you were in the room...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.5: You know that all ghosts avoid the light and hide in the dark...
You know that all ghosts avoid the light and hide in the dark...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.6: But listen, now. There's one ghost who fled from the gallery who only hides in the darkest places... His name... is Uncle Grimmly...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.7: If he's on the loose, then now may be your only chance to get him... Why don't you try looking for him before you get those lights back on? Might be wise...
If he's on the loose, then now may be your only chance to get him... Why don't you try looking for him before you get those lights back on? Might be wise...
//luigis_mansion:dialog.uncle_grimmly.8: He's old for a ghost, but it's only made him more cautious. I do know, though, that for some reason he tends to prefer rooms with mirrors...

luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.1: Portræt spøgelser er en gåde, skan dem med din Gameboy Rædsel for et hint.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.10: Område boss besejret, tag dine malerier i laboratoriet. En ting til, aftensmaden er klar.
Område boss besejret, tag jeres malerier i laboratoriet. En ting til, aftensmaden er klar.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.11: Lyset er gået ud. Spøgelser vil løbe rundt i hele palæet. Vær forsigtig.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.12: Område boss besejret, tag dine malerier i laboratoriet. Få Mario ud af det sted!
Område boss besejret, tag jeres malerier i laboratoriet. Få Mario ud af det sted!
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.2: Område boss besejret, tag dine malerier i laboratoriet. Du viste det boss spøgelse hvem der er bossen!
Område boss besejret, tag jeres malerier i laboratoriet. Du viste det boss spøgelse hvem der er bossen!
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.3: Der er spøgelser der vil holde fast på dig, hvis det sker løb væk fra dem.
Der er spøgelser der vil holde fast på jer, hvis det sker løb væk fra dem.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.4: Booer er blevet frie, gå tilbage til Møller Triks laboratorium så hurtigt som muligt.
Tak for Booen. Hvorfor ikke hjælpe planterne?
Tak for Booen. Hvis du ikke vidste det, kommer intet spøgelse til syne for dig.
Tak for Booen. Hvis i ikke vidste det, kommer intet spøgelse til syne for jer.
Tak for Booen. De små spøgelser er sandsynligvis lavet af et Portræt spøgelse ved navn Vincent Van Gore.
Tak for Booen. Vand slår ild, ild slår is, og is slår vand.
Booer hader lyset og gemmer sig i møbler, tænd lyset og send mig Boo dataen.
Tak for Booen. Gå og plask noget vand i dit ansigt i vaskerummet.
Tak for Booen. Gå og plask noget vand i jeres ansigt i vaskerummet.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.6: Du kan nu bruge Ild Element Spøgelser. Du kan smelte is, brænde dører og Blitzes og tænde stearinlys med ild elementet.
I kan nu bruge Ild Element Spøgelser. I kan smelte is, brænde dører og Blitzes og tænde stearinlys med ild elementet.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.7: Du kan nu bruge Vand Element Spøgelser. Du kan vande planter og slukke Temperament Terrors med Vand Elementet.
I kan nu bruge Vand Element Spøgelser. I kan vande planter og slukke Temperament Terrors med Vand Elementet.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.8: Område boss besejret, hent dine malerier i  laboratoriet. Og nej, poltergusten tager ikke skade af lyn.
Område boss besejret, hent jeres malerier i  laboratoriet. Og nej, poltergusten tager ikke skade af lyn.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.9: Du kan nu bruge Is Element Spøgelser. Du kan fryse vand, stope Blå Blazes og immobilisere med Is Elementet.
I kan nu bruge Is Element Spøgelser. I kan fryse vand, stope Blå Blazes og immobilisere med Is Elementet.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.bi: Denne Bodybuilder elsker muskler og liljer. Hvorfor liljer? De symbolisere renhed.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.bo: Et produkt af palæets frygt og fortvivlelse. Han er ikke sikker på hvem at frygte eller hvad at fortvivle disse dage.
Når de sky, generte booer går sammen, deres krop og deres attribut bliver STORE!
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ch: Han græder højt og sover aldrig gennem natten, men siden han blev født et spøgelse virker det naturligt.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.cl: De tilhørte engang til en legetøjssamler. Men nu marcherer de selv uden at blive drejet.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.fl: Det Dansende Par: De Svævende Whirlindaser.
De var engang de lokale mestre i vals. Nu kan de ikke længere konkurrere da deres fødder ikke rører gulvet
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.he: De elsker at lege gemmeleg. Men siden de begge gemmer sig, bliver spillet aldrig færdigt
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ja: Han elskede antikke krukker så meget at han nu lever i en. Han kan svært styrer sig selv!
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ki: Den Ubehalige Duo: Kong Boo og Bowser.
Intet er vidst omkring denne mystiske figur.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ly: Hun har gemt sin opsparing væk i forberedelse til hendes lange efterliv.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ma: Hendes tætte forbindelse til åndeverdenen gør at hun kan se næsten 49 dage ind i fremtiden.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.me: På trods af at spille rørende melodier, er hun altid i et surt humør. Mærkeligt nok elsker hun at spille computerspill.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.mi: Andenplads til Miss Spøgelse konkurrencen for seks år siden. Hun har ikke haft meget modelarbejde på det seneste.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.mr: Han fortrækker alt-du-kan-spise buffeter til tre måltider per dag. Han åd sig selv ihjel, men var stadig ikke tilfreds.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.na: Hun strikker stadig tørklædet hun aldrig blev færdig med da hun var i live. Det er nu 265 meter langt.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.ne: Neville bruger hans efterliv på at læse alle de bøger han ikke nåede mens han var i live.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.sh: Han vandrer igennem huset i en endeløs søgen efter hans herres testamente. Han håber han er med i det!
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.si: Denne mærkelige persons iskolde bolig kan være grunden til at han ikke er blevet varm på ideen af at være et spøgelse.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.sl: Karl er en legende in billard verdenen. Ærgeligt at han aldrig har spillet mod en levende sjæl.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.sp: Denne uhyggelige hund vil synke dens tænder ind i alt der er spiseligt.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.su: Hvad der skulle have været en kort lur ser ud til at have blevet en evig søvn for søde Suzie.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.un: Tabt i mørket, han holder sig for sig selv, hvilket passer resten af familien helt fint.
luigis_mansion:message.gameboy_horror.vi: Den Sultende Kunstner: Vincent Van Gore.
Selvom han ikke har solgt et eneste maleri i 30 år, har denne stædige mand ikke tænkt sig at lade sin kunst dø.
luigis_mansion:message.get_high_score: Din højeste score i %1$s er %2$s000 G.
luigis_mansion:message.get_high_score.no: Din højeste score i %1$s er 0 G.
luigis_mansion:message.gumboo.1: Det er mit eget selv, GumBoo!
luigis_mansion:message.lydia.scan: (Er mit hår ikke bare smukt? Selvfølgelig, Jeg bruger en masse tid på det. Jeg kedede mig så meget inde i maleriet... Nu bruger jeg al min tid foran spejlet. Det ser ud til at skræmme folk, men det passer mig godt!)
//luigis_mansion:message.melody_pianissi: (Hmph! This ragamuffin looks like as if he couldn't play a note!)
luigis_mansion:message.melody_pianissima: (Hmph! Disse krapyl ser ud som om at de ikke kan spille en eneste node!)
//luigis_mansion:message.melody_pianissi: (Show him the power of genius, my Music Sheets!)
luigis_mansion:message.melody_pianissima: (Vis dem kraften af mit geni, mine Musikark!)
luigis_mansion:message.mr_bones: For jords skyld, få den dumme hund til at ti stille!
luigis_mansion:message.mr_luggs.scan: (Ingen kan se mig i dette mørke! Ingen ingen ingen ingeeeen!)
luigis_mansion:message.multiplayer.1: Flere spøgelsesjægere betyder flere at forskrække.
luigis_mansion:message.multiplayer.2: Jeg undrer mig over hvor mange der vil være tilbage efter dette.
luigis_mansion:message.multiplayer.3: En sjette spøgelsesjæger? Flere er mere skræmmende.
luigis_mansion:message.multiplayer.4: Spiller vi Super Smash Brothers? Fordi jeg tror ikke at det er meningen at der skal være så mange spøgelsesjægere, ikke at jeg ikke syntes om skrigeriet og sveden...
//luigis_mansion:message.nana.scan: (Hey, it's a funny man. Should I play with him?)
//luigis_mansion:message.nana.scan.more: (Hey, it's funny people. Should I play with them?)
luigis_mansion:message.neville.scan: (Hæ hæ hæ.. Værsgo, prøv at finde mig. Jeg kan se dig, men du kan ikke se mig, hæ hæ hæ...)
luigis_mansion:message.neville.scan.more: (Hæ hæ hæ.. Værsgo, prøv at finde mig. Jeg kan se jer, men i kan ikke se mig, hæ hæ hæ...)
luigis_mansion:message.pink_clockwork_so: (Heyyyyy, stooooppp meed at kiiiggge pååå miiiiig!)
luigis_mansion:message.player.marios_glo: Du fandt Marios handske! Ad, den er en smulle svedig...
I fandt Marios handske! Ad, den er en smulle svedig...
//luigis_mansion:message.player.marios_h: You found Mario's hat! And it has been laundried lately...
You found Mario's hat! And it has been laundried lately...
luigis_mansion:message.player.marios_let: Du fandt Marios brev! Gad vide hvad der står...
I fandt Marios brev! Gad vide hvad der står...
luigis_mansion:message.player.marios_sho: Du fandt Marios sko! Den lugter som... Marios fødder.
I fandt Marios sko! Den lugter som... Marios fødder.
//luigis_mansion:message.player.marios_s: You found Mario's star! My, what a glittering beauty...
You found Mario's star! My, what a glittering beauty...
luigis_mansion:message.player.scan_furni: Sikke et frygteligt billede... Men stearinlyset ved siden af det er måske vigtigt...
Jeg tør vædde på at jeg ville se hård ud med en af disse ...
Jeg tør vædde på at de vil falde ned hvis jeg rystede denne godt...
Jeg gad godt besøge det ydre rum en dag...
Den vil muligvis være sjov at snorre...
Jeg ville ønske at jeg havde nok tid til at rydde denne lidt op...
Er der nogen særlig grund til at gøre den så lang og slank? Mærkeligt...
Den her ser kun ud som om den er i vejen...
Af en eller anden grund så har jeg bare lyst til at snorre den rundt...
Hmm... fryset solid. Jeg fryser bare ved at kigge på den.
//luigis_mansion:message.player.scan_fur: One really shouldn't open this kind of thing without asking...
That looks cold... Hey! I can see my breath!
A fire feels good on a night as cold as this...
Ugggh! I don't think this door is going to open...
Ah this is %1$s, hopefully they are useful in this adventure.
And here we have the exquisite %1$s outside their natural habitat.
The mighty %1$s... maybe shoving a plastic, multi-functional device in their face isn't the best way to forge friendships.
Scanned %1$s... why?
Flashlight in hand, Gameboy Horror in reach, Poltergust 3000 at the ready, %1$s is prepared to venture forth!
%1$s seems to have sustained some injuries.. perhaps a rest could help.
%1$s is certainly alive...
Nothing unusual here... Boring!
%1$s is barely holding on...
The infamous coin hoarding %1$s!
Detective %1$s! I don't even need to check their licence or job history!
Ghostbuster %1$s! Hope they don't capture me in the process!
I don't think I can reach that directly...
Now that I look at it-- it's full of moth holes! Yecch!
So much dust! This will never pass the white-glove test!
Well, they sure did pile odds and ends everywhere... Filthy.
Oh, what's this?! Just how I like it... Nice and clean!
Well, I sure can't read that from here...
I wonder how old this is...
I'm willing to bet there's something cold in here.
I've been wanting one of these for quite a while...
Oh, wow... I've always wanted one of these!
What kind of picture is this?
I really have no use for this...
Not particularly interesting...
Hmmm... Weird...
Awww, poor thing...
How could anyone treat an animal that way? I won't stand for it!!
Oh, what's this?! This would sure fetch a pretty penny...
Looks like something might be in there...
Personally, I've always liked the bottom bunk a bit better...
Now, that's a classic. I wonder how much it would sell for.
If you look closely, you can tell it's really just a photograph!
This looks like it might break if I sit on it...
Man, I'm tired... That bed sure looks comfy.
I could just curl up there and sleep until dawn...
Now who is this supposed to be?
Was someone trying to show off or what?
What's this?! Looks fancy!
HAHAHA! Who designed this?!
There's something fishy here...
Well, at least we won't have a shortage of toilet paper...
I really should work out more. Maybe I ought to throw a few quick jabs while I'm here...
I'm not so interested in bikes...
I've always been a good runner...
I don't care much for pointy objects...
It looks old, but I bet it still has a nice tone...
Hmm. Should I play it?
I never could play the piano...
Looks like a fun place to make shadow puppets...
Looks like this hasn't gotten much use of late...
What's this, an antique?
Now that's just not my style.
Wouldn't it be nice if I could raise carrier pigeons here?
What in the world is this?
This is the kind of thing I would put in the bathroom...
Fabulous!
Exquisite...
Looks ordinary... A little TOO ordinary.
I should probably give that a quick vacuuming...
(Way to go, genius... Do you have the hang of that thing yet?)
What's this?! This certainly adds to the atmosphere of the place...
Looks pretty normal to me...
You know... I never noticed how cute those red polka dots look on top!
Boy, that looks hot... Someone should probably cool it off.
Simply delightful...
Just like a real person... how very creepy.
Looks rather old and fragile...
Boy, those Boos sure did make a realistic fake mansion...
Breathtaking! A simple design with a dash of casual elegance!
Gosh, I am just so finicky when it comes to hats...
These look kind of comfortable... No, I'll stick with my buds!
This looks pricey...
Now THAT is what I call interior decorating!
It's a picture...but I wouldn't call it art.
No one's watered this in a long time... How very sad.
I think I used to have one of these! Yeah, I did!
Hey, it's flower season, isn't it? I almost forgot!
If that's an antique, I'll eat my hat.
I could just gaze at one of these for hours...
That would be a good spot to hide some savings...
I hope that's sturdier than it looks...
This could be handy in case of fire...
Yuck! Talk about filthy!
Wh-What's this...? Eeek! Oh... It's just a chair.
This looks quite old... I wonder how much it would sell for.
Do Boos wash their faces?
For some reason, this makes me feel profound sadness...
It must have been quite a chore to keep this old mansion clean...
Now honestly, when it comes to hats, they really must be hand washed. There's simply no substituce. I know Mario likes to put his through the washing machine, but that just seems careless to me...
Did someone win a championship for this or what?
Maybe I should get some of those do-it-yourself books...
I'm quite taken with this...
If only there were a couple of cookies or something in there...
Candlelight makes any ordinary room simply beautiful...
The candle on that table looks kind of... weird.
I wonder why only this one's frozen...
What a hunk of junk! You expect me to sit on that? Please! I have standards!
I wonder if there are any goodies there...
Didn't anyone ever tell these ghosts not to waste water?
What's written on that sign?
What a lovely crystal ball! You know, these give off such a beautiful glow when light shines on them... I wonder if my flashlight would work...
I guess you just can't plan for this sort of thing...
Huh...?
Aww, it's gone out. Would relighting it do any good?
How disturbing...
It's a statue... A very tall angel statue by the looks of it...
//luigis_mansion:message.shivers.fire: Ahhhhh! Fire! Fire! Fire! Run away! Run awaaaay!
//luigis_mansion:message.shivers.scan.1: (Ah, the beautiful Melody will not even give me the time of day... What must I do to win her? Passion! yes! That's it! I will show her I burn for her! My unbridled passion will scorch her soul!)
//luigis_mansion:message.shivers.scan.2: (The burning flames of unbridled passion! Or... wait, how about the passionate flames of unbridled burning?)
//luigis_mansion:message.sir_weston.scan: (Darn, I love the cold, I mean, I just plain love it!)
//luigis_mansion:message.sue_pea.scan: (I won't wet the bed... I promise... )

luigis_mansion:settings.game.brightness: Lysstyrke sat til "Lyst"; den tilsigtede lysstyrke på kortet styres via dimensionerne. Hvis du sætter den lavere, kan du muligvis ikke se noget.
luigis_mansion:settings.game.music: Musik er tildelt musikskyderen og Ambience-skyderen, hvis der er flere numre på én gang. Luigi's nynnen styres via Player-skyderen.
luigis_mansion:settings.game.server: Sørg for, at disse er værdierne for de følgende felter, hvis du kører dette kort på en server:
luigis_mansion:settings.game.sounds: Lyde tildeles deres rigtige skyder, spøgelser tildeles fjendtlige væsner, E. Gadd til venlige skabninger osv.
luigis_mansion:settings.modified.open_ma: Sæt "åbn kort når nøgle samles op" til "%1$s".
luigis_mansion:settings.open_map_on_key_: Åbn kort når nøgle samles op: %1$s.
